cards.name: Stallob, the Lifequasher
cards.set: DM-09 Fatal Brood of Infinite Ruin
cards.text:
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
When this creature is destroyed, destroy all creatures.

While this creature has power 15000 or more, it has "triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields)" instead of "double breaker."

When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses up to 2 creatures in his hand and puts them into the battle zone.

cards.name: King Oquanos
cards.set: DM-10 Shockwaves of the Shattered Rainbow
cards.text:
This creature gets +2000 power for each tapped card in your opponent's mana zone.

Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

cards.text: Whenever this creature attacks, return a card from your mana zone to your hand.
cards.flavor: Rhythmically swayed by Sabermask Scarab's giant wings, the branches and leaves of the forest sing a march for it as it flies overhead.

cards.name: Scowling Tomato

cards.flavor: "The barbaric practice of eating salad will no longer be tolerated! The demented minds that created tomato juice will be hunted down! The dual atrocities of tomato paste and tomato sauce end here! And whether you call it ketchup or catsup, know this - soon I shall call it revenge!"

cards.name: Ninja Pumpkin

cards.flavor: This mysterious hero endlessly battles against pie bakers, the enemies of Wild Veggies everywhere.

cards.name: Quillspike Rumbler
cards.text: Whenever this creature attacks a creature, this creature gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.
cards.flavor: The three most dangerous things to do in the forest are lick Poisonous Dahlia, clip Stratosphere Giant's toenails, and give Quillspike Rumbler a back rub.

cards.name: Rainbow Gate
cards.text: Search your deck. You may take a multi-colored creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: Ten thousand miles away, Bombazar's Dragon hockey team suddenly found itself a player short.

cards.name: Rollicking Totem
cards.text: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent skill ability.) : Put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your mana zone into the battle zone.
cards.flavor: "Camouflage? That's a funny word. What's it mean?"

cards.name: Royal Durian
cards.text: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent skill ability.) : Put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your mana zone into the battle zone.

cards.name: Skyscraper Shell
cards.text: Wave striker (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "wave striker," this creature has its Wave striker ability.) : When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and puts it into his mana zone.

cards.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
(This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.)
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one of them that has "blocker" into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.text:
(This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.)
Whenever you summon a creature this turn, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck that has the same name as that creature and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: "The 5:15 rift in the universe is early today." —Techno Totem

cards.name: Hide and Seek
cards.text:
(This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.)
Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and return it to his hand. Then he discards a card at random from his hand.

cards.text:
(This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.)
Whenever any of your opponent's creatures is destroyed this turn, your opponent chooses a card in his mana zone and puts it into his graveyard. Then he chooses one of his shields and puts it into his graveyard.
cards.flavor: This is what happens when nightmares have nightmares.

cards.name: Reap and Sow
cards.text:
(This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.)

Evolution—Put on one of your Gladiators.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.)
cards.flavor: It knows when war is coming because it decides when war is coming.

(This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.)

(This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

cards.name: Cosmic Darts

cards.name: Typhoon Crawler
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures
cards.text: This creature can't be attacked by fire or nature creatures.

cards.name: Meloppe
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

Whenever you would choose one of your opponent's shields, your opponent chooses instead.

cards.name: Gigavrand
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

cards.name: Whirling Warrior Malian
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

cards.name: Mechadragon's Breath
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

cards.flavor: "Yes! After three long years of neverending work, my invention is a complete success! Now we can finally start the barbecue!" — Rikabu, the Dismantler

cards.name: Pincer Scarab
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures
cards.text:
This creature gets +2000 power for each card in your opponent's hand.
While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker (this creature breaks 2 shields)."
cards.flavor: "Its pincers are so sharp, they can cut clouds in half." — Aura Pegasus, Avatar of Life

cards.name: Radioactive Horn, the Strange
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

(This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

cards.name: Gigabalza

When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

cards.name: Muramasa's Knife

cards.name: Cloned Spike-Horn
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

This creature gets +3000 power for each Cloned Spike-Horn in each graveyard.

cards.name: Electro Explorer Syrion
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures
cards.text: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

Now that he's an IFO - an identified flying object - he gets invited to a lot more parties." — Wise Starnoid, Avatar of Hope

cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

cards.name: Gigappi Ponto
cards.set: DM-12 Thrash of the Hybrid Megacreatures

cards.name: Bingole, the Explorer

cards.flavor: "See what happens when you take your vitamins?" —Pyrofighter Magnus

cards.name: Kyrstron, Lair Delver
cards.text: When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your hand into the battle zone.
cards.flavor: "Sneak in, grab some Dragon eggs, sneak out, and make one enormous omelet. What could be simpler?"

cards.name: Slash Charger
cards.text:
Search a player's deck. You may take a card from that deck and put it into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his deck.
Charger (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: "Life is short. And now it's shorter." —Azaghast, Tyrant of Shadows

cards.name: Terradragon Anrist Vhal
cards.text:
This creature gets +2000 power for each of your other nature creatures in the battle zone. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)
While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."
cards.flavor: The ever-increasing cries of the world only fuel the Dragons' anger.

cards.name: Loth Rix, the Iridescent
cards.text:
Evolution—Put on one of your Guardians.
When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.
cards.flavor: "The pure of heart will always triumph over the gross and icky of heart."

cards.name: Twister Fish
cards.text: Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
cards.flavor: "They make great pets. But they make even better warriors." —Tropico

cards.name: Gigagrax
cards.text: When this creature is destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.
cards.flavor: The tour guide to the Abyss of Eternal Despair.

cards.name: Star-Cry Dragon
cards.text:
Each of your other Armored Dragons in the battle zone gets +3000 power.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
cards.flavor: "Rise to the sky and dive to the earth! Scorch the battlefield with your breath! Attack, my brothers, attack!"

cards.name: Angry Maple
cards.text: Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
cards.flavor: "I always want to look my best for a big battle. I trim my branches. I comb my leaves, I'm looking sharp—and then wham! Bird's nest. Every time."

cards.name: Ur Pale, Seeker of Sunlight
cards.text: While all the cards in your mana zone are light cards, this creature gets +2000 power.
cards.flavor: "What will it do if it finds the sunlight?" —Bloody Squito

cards.name: Toel, Vizier of Hope
cards.text: At the end of each of your turns, you may untap all your creatures in the battle zone.
cards.flavor: "Vizier of Hope, arise. Your singing voice is a breeze of dawn." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental

cards.name: Aqua Jolter
cards.text: Shield trigger (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)
cards.flavor: Saltwater makes me thirsty.

cards.name: Aqua Hulcus
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: Liquid People freely control liquid. For them, water is armor and shield.

cards.name: Gigastand
cards.text: When this creature would be put into your graveyard from the battle zone, you may return it to your hand instead. If you do, discard a card from your hand.
cards.flavor: Even nasty, rampaging invaders get a little homesick sometimes.

cards.name: Dark Raven, Shadow of Grief
cards.text: Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
cards.flavor: If you've ever thought there was something hiding in the dark, you were right.

cards.name: Mongrel Man
cards.text: Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Shut off a light for a split second, and darkness rushes in to fill the void. This should be an easy war."

cards.name: Super Explosive Volcanodon
cards.text: Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
cards.flavor: After it attacks, the lucky are left with rubble.

cards.name: Rothus, the Traveler
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses 1 of his creatures and destroys it.
cards.flavor: "Though battered and scarred, I march on through wars, storms, and strife. I march on."

cards.name: Mighty Shouter
cards.text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
cards.flavor: "I am not pink!"

cards.name: Gigaberos
cards.text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your other creatures or destroy this creature.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

cards.name: Draglide
cards.text: This creature attacks each turn if able.
cards.flavor: Draglides grow with their mounts. Their bond is their weapon.

cards.name: Szubs Kin, Twilight Guardian
cards.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
cards.flavor: Those who dwell in the sky towers eradicate all intruders.

cards.name: Stampeding Longhorn
cards.text: This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 3000 or less.
cards.flavor: A stampeding longhorn leaves nothing but dust in its wake.

cards.name: Tropico
cards.text: This creature can't be blocked while you have at least 2 other creatures in the battle zone.
cards.flavor: "I will lead you into battle."

cards.name: Mighty Shouter
cards.text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
cards.flavor: "I am not pink!"

cards.name: Arc Bine, the Astounding
cards.text:
Evolution—Put on one of your Guardians.
Each of your light creatures may tap instead of attacking to use this creature's ability. : Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.
cards.flavor: "Dragonoids like explosions? Then this is their lucky day!"

cards.name: Gariel, Elemental of Sunbeams
cards.text:
You can summon this creature only if you have cast a spell this turn.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
cards.flavor: "Elementals can't stand being on the ground instead of in the sky. So when they start a war, they make sure it ends quickly."

cards.name: Three-Faced Ashura Fang
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.
cards.flavor: It'll never turn its back on you. It can't.

cards.name: Slaphappy Soldier Galback
cards.text: Turbo rush (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its   ability until the end of the turn.) : Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

cards.name: Super Dragon Machine Dolzark
cards.text:
(This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)
Whenever one of your other creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 5000 or less and put it into his mana zone.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
cards.flavor: Fateful encounter brought them a death battle. Fateful reunion ended their war.

cards.name: Gigandura
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand. You may choose a card in it and put it into his mana zone. If you do, choose a card in his mana zone and put it into his hand.
cards.flavor: It used to be a panther, a raven, a goat, and alive.

cards.name: Bazagazeal Dragon
cards.text:
Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)
This creature can attack untapped creatures.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
At the end of your turn, return this creature to your hand.

cards.name: Melnia, the Aqua Shadow
cards.text:
(This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)
This creature can't be blocked.
Slayer (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)
cards.flavor: The rainbow's aftershocks caused unimaginable energy warps, which resulted in unimaginable hybrids.

cards.name: Neve, the Leveler
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has more creatures in the battle zone than you do, search your deck. For each extra creature he has, you may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Stampeding Longhorn
cards.text: This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 3000 or less.
cards.flavor: A stampeding longhorn leaves nothing but dust in its wake.

cards.name: Terror Pit
cards.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures.

cards.name: Holy Awe
cards.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

cards.name: Corile
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it on top of his deck.
cards.flavor: When the cataclysm struck, all the science of the Cyber Lords couldn't prevent the collapse of their underwater city.

cards.name: Aqua Hulcus
cards.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: Liquid People freely control liquid. For them, water is armor and shield.

cards.name: Snip Striker Bullraizer
cards.text: This creature can't attack while your opponent has more creatures in the battle zone than you do.
cards.flavor: "You're getting more than just a haircut."

cards.name: Photocide, Lord of the Wastes
cards.text:
This creature can't attack players.
This creature can attack untapped light creatures.
cards.flavor: "I will snuff out the sun and the stars! Then I'll move on to the candles and the lanterns. If I have time, I'll take care of those glow sticks people wear around thier necks. But the sun is first!"

cards.name: Crystal Lancer
cards.text:
Evolution—Put on one of your Liquid People.
This creature can't be blocked.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
